1.verse_text: If someone does not do what wicked people tell him to do, if he does not join with sinners , if he does not meet with those who laugh at God, God has blessed that person! He thinks about God's Law during the day and at night. It gives its fruit at the right season. Its leaves do not fall off. Everything that person does will have a good result. Sinners cannot join with God's people, But wicked people are living in a way that will take them to a bad end.
He is happy when he obeys the Law of the Lord .
He will become like a tree that grows beside streams of water.
But wicked people are as empty as chaff . The wind blows them away. the people who are right with God.
So they will not go free when God judges them.
The Lord takes care of people who respect him.

2.verse_text: Why are nations making plans to turn against the Lord ? All their plans will fail! to fight against the Lord and the king that he has chosen. He says that their plans are useless . He warns them with strong words and he says, I have put him on my holy mountain." He said to me, "You are my son. I will give you all the nations on the earth. They will all belong to you. as if they are clay pots." You who rule the nations of the world, learn this lesson: Enjoy his rule with fear ! If not, the Lord will be angry. He will quickly become very angry. You will suddenly die! But as for those who serve the Lord as their king, he blesses them and he takes care of them all.

"I have put my king on his throne in Zion .
I will tell you what the Lord has promised to me, his king.

3.verse_text: Lord , every day I have more enemies. Many people fight against me. "God will not save him." Selah . You are the one who gives me honour . You lift my head up high. He answered me from his holy mountain. Selah. Then I wake up, because the Lord takes care of me. I will not be afraid of them. Hit all my enemies in the face. Break the teeth of those bad people. At sunrise I will turn to you for help, Evil people cannot live near you. God, you hate everyone who does evil things. The Lord hates murderers, because of your faithful love. 6.verse_text: Lord , when you are angry, please do not punish me. so please be kind to me. Lord , please make me well again. Even my bones are shaking . Make me safe because of your faithful love. Nobody can praise you in their grave ! My bed becomes wet because I weep all night. Now he has answered me! They will go away from me in fear ! Shame will suddenly come to them!

They will attack me like lions do, and nobody will be able to save me. then let my enemies chase me and catch me. If I have done a bad thing against a friend, let my enemies catch me. Punish them in the way that you know is right! to stand in front of you. Rule over them from high above. Lord , Most High God, say that I am not guilty . Truly, I am righteous and honest. He does nothing that will hurt his friends, nor does he insult them. but he does respect people who serve the Lord . When he promises to do something, he always does it. and he does not ask for more money in return. He does not accept a bribe , to speak against people who have done nothing wrong. They are truly great people! to people who choose to worship other gods. I will not join with them to offer gifts of blood to their gods. I will never use the names of their gods to make promises. 17.verse_text: Lord , please listen to me. I am asking you to do something that is right. I am speaking what is true, so please do what I ask you to do. You can see for yourself that I am right. You check my thoughts at night. When you test me, you find nothing that is wrong. I have decided that I will never tell any lies . But I have obeyed your commands . I have not joined with cruel people to do what they do. I do not turn away from them. because you will answer me. Please listen to me when I pray to you. You have the power to keep people safe from their enemies. You help them when they trust you for help. in the same way that people take care of their eyes. Keep me near to you, in the way that birds protect their babies under their wings . My enemies are all around me, and they want to kill me! They speak proud words. They look for their chance to knock me down to the ground. They want to tear me into pieces. They are hiding like young lions. They are ready to jump out and catch me! Fight against them! Fire and hot coals came out from his mouth, to destroy his enemies. Dark clouds were under his feet. The wind carried him as he travelled. He hid himself in dark clouds that held rain. 22.verse_text: My God! My God, why have you left me alone? Why is my help far away? I am crying out in great pain! I call aloud to you for help every day, all day and all night! But you do not answer my prayers , so I cannot sleep. You sit on your throne as king, and Israel's people praise you. When they trusted you, you saved them. They trusted in you, They think that I am worth nothing. It seems that I am only a worm , and I am not really a man. They laugh and they shake their heads. The Lord should save him. If the Lord is really happy with him, the Lord should rescue him." You took care of me at my mother's breasts. I have always been in your care. You have been my God since my mother gave birth to me. Trouble is near to me, and there is nobody to help me. I cannot move because my enemies are very near, all around me. They are ready to eat me! They are like lions that tear their food into pieces. like water that is poured away. My bones do not join together properly. I feel weak inside and hope has disappeared. Praise him, all bright stars. and the water above the sky. It was his command that created them. Nothing can change the command that he has given. Praise him, sea monsters and all the deep seas. Praise him, wind and storm, as you obey his commands. Praise him fruit trees and all trees in the forests. Praise him, snakes and birds. and people of every nation . Praise him, princes and all rulers on earth. Praise him, old men, as well as children. Only the Lord 's name is great above all other names. He is the king who rules over heaven and earth. so that other nations respect them. All the people who serve him should praise him. They are the Israelite nation, who belong to him. Hallelujah! Praise the Lord !
They should all praise the name of the Lord .
He has fixed them in their places for all time.
Praise the Lord from the earth!
Praise him, fire and hail , snow and clouds.
Praise him, mountains and all hills.
Praise him, wild animals and farm animals.
Praise him, kings all over the world,
Praise him, young men and young women.
They should all praise the name of the Lord .
He has made his own people strong,

149.verse_text: Hallelujah ! Praise the Lord ! Sing a new song to worship the Lord . When his own people meet together, they should praise him. because God made you. People of Zion , be very happy, because God is your king. Take your harps and tambourines and make music to praise him with your songs. it makes him happy. He is happy to help humble people, so that people respect them. because he has made them great. They should always sing with joy , even when they lie on their beds at night. while they hold sharp swords in their hands. to punish them for their sins . and put the rulers in prison. in the way that is right. That is how God will cause his people to become great. Hallelujah! Praise the Lord !
People of Israel, be very happy,
Yes, dance to praise the name of the Lord .
When the Lord 's people serve him,
The people who belong to God should be very happy,
They should shout aloud to praise God,
That is how they must fight against other nations ,
They must tie up the foreign kings with chains ,
They must do that to punish their enemies

150.verse_text: Hallelujah ! Praise the Lord ! Praise God in his temple . Praise him high in the sky, where he shows his great strength . Praise him because he is great and powerful. Yes! Use trumpets , harps and lyres Make music with harps and flutes to praise him! to praise him! Hallelujah! Praise the Lord !
Praise God for the great things that he has done.
Praise him with music! to praise God!
Dance and hit drums to praise him!
Make music with big cymbals and small cymbals
Everything that is alive should praise the Lord .
